original_text: Have you been thinking all along that we have been defending ourselves to you? We have been speaking in the sight of God as those in Christ; and everything we do, dear friends, is for your strengthening.
korean_text: 너희는 이 때까지 우리가 자기 변명을 하는 줄로 생각하는구나 우리는 그리스도 안에서 하나님 앞에 말하노라 사랑하는 자들아 이 모든 것은 너희의 덕을 세우기 위함이니라

sentences.original_text: Have you been thinking all along
that we have been defending ourselves to you?
We have been speaking in the sight of God
and everything we do, dear friends,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리가 하는 모든 것은, 사랑하는 친구들이여,
